title: 05/26/21 DPS Hour 3 Clayton Kershaw
itunes:title: 05/26/21 DPS Hour 3 Clayton Kershaw
description:
Clayton Kershaw tells Dan that he has nothing against all the no-hitters. And he says he got a little bit of closure after beating the Astros in Houston last night.
